name: ffmpeg
desc:
FFmpeg is a solution to record, convert and stream audio and video.
It is a very fast video and audio converter and it can also acquire from
a live audio/video source. Designed to be intuitive, the command-line
interface (ffmpeg) tries to figure out all the parameters, when possible.
FFmpeg can also convert from any sample rate to any other, and resize
video on the fly with a high quality polyphase filter. FFmpeg can use a
Video4Linux compatible video source and any Open Sound System audio
source.
